snippet: The company is owned by Jimmy Haslam, who controls the Cleveland Browns football team, and his brother, Gov. Bill Haslam of Tennessee.
abstract: Pilot Flying J, truck stop company owned by Jimmy Haslam, who controls Cleveland Browns football team, and his brother Tennessee Gov Bill Haslam, agrees to pay $92 million penalty for cheating customers out of promised rebates and discounts.
lead_paragraph: The company is owned by Jimmy Haslam, who controls the Cleveland Browns football team, and his brother, Gov. Bill Haslam of Tennessee.

headline.main: Tennessee Truck Stop Company Will Pay $92 Million Fine
headline.print_headline: Tennessee Truck Stop Company Will Pay $92 Million Fine
